Text: Wow. Thank you so much for those uploads (Thanks to MrDowntown and mirrormaster82 too). But hey, Batwing is actually a very good comic book. Nice art, decent story. I've read already 4 of the 13, alphabetically, and so far I'm very happy by this DC reboot. I wasn't a DC reader before, and I feel that I can finally get into the story without having to recatch all the previous stories... Anyway, nice work dude:)
I think this might be one of the better books to come out(even with winnick writing).
writing is alright so far, but god damn is the artwork beautiful!
